title: Performer Plus
description: Occupational health software which helps employers manage workplace risks, injuries and diseases.

title: Crusader
description: Crusader is a free and open-source Warhammer 40,000 Crusade assistant. -- I made an app to track things in a table-top game which I play with friends. 🤓

title: COVIDCare Screening PWA
description: PWA for the occupational health industry which is used by employees to self-screen for COVID-19 on a daily basis.
